attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: first thing they do is ask for my phone number as if i was an orange leather bag of a man to contact me. very scary don’t recommend.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app sent nasty images of our president to my children. Do not get this application.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app gave me brain rot, please take it off the App Store 😔. It’s existence alone is having detrimental effects on my mental and physical health
I saw the ugliest Cheeto man who is racist, an alleged rapist, and homophobic, along with many other things in the world when I first opened the app. Disgusting

attributes.title: Horrible Service And Experience
attributes.review: If I court give this trash app a 0 Star rating I would.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE 😔
attributes.review: This app is VERY GLITCHY! Also some of the content on my feed is very EXPLICIT 🤯 NOT APPROPRIATE AND IM VERY DISAPPOINTED 😡 If i could rate this app a 0 i would 😥 I think i am going to throw up. I hate it. #hehe

attributes.title: i was disgusted
attributes.review: i was told this game was supposed to be super fun and i was recommended it by so many of my peers... but... IT WAS SO BAD 🤮🤮🤢 THE GRAPHICS SUCKED I AND THE MECHANICS ARE BROKEN, PLUS THERE WAS THIS ONE IN GAME CHARACTER I HATED SO MUCH!! this oNE GUY WITH A ROTTING ORANGE PEEL FOR HAIR?? IDK HIS NAME BUT HE LOOKS SO GROSS I DONT KNOW WHO HE IS BUT I WOULDN'T WANNA BE NEAR HIM IRL

attributes.title: 🧚🏻🥰✨No✨🥰🧚🏻
attributes.review: This app is absolute trash. Horrible color scheme, I saw a man with a nasty tangerine lookin spray tan. His hair looks as dead as my great great grandma. Just bad quality as well. Also... ew.

attributes.title: no
attributes.review: the second i downloaded the app it immediately smelled bad and took away human rights. will not be downloading again. might as well say sorry while writing this review because i do not want a red dot pointed at my head later tonight.
